content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254212,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達は戦わなくていいのでしょうかとシィル","translatedEnglishLine":"Sil asks, \"Do we not have to fight?\""},{"lineNumber":254213,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、雑魚は雑魚に任せておけばいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, let the small fry handle the small fry.\""},{"lineNumber":254214,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれから２時間ほど立った。","translatedEnglishLine":"About two hours passed since then."},{"lineNumber":254215,"originalJapaneseLine":"くつろいでいる様子","translatedEnglishLine":"They are relaxing."},{"lineNumber":254216,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに報告、魔人シルキィが現れました。","translatedEnglishLine":"A report comes in: the demon Silky has appeared."},{"lineNumber":254217,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつものように単独で現れ、戦線をかき乱しています","translatedEnglishLine":"As usual, she appeared alone and is disrupting the front lines."},{"lineNumber":254218,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、捕まえて犯す！いくぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, capture her and violate her! Let's go!"},{"lineNumber":254219,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒れた傷付いたリーザス騎士、","translatedEnglishLine":"The fallen and wounded Leazas knights,"},{"lineNumber":254220,"originalJapaneseLine":"さきほどまでシルキィの突進を受けていた部隊だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was the unit that had just been charged by Silky."},{"lineNumber":254221,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな大げがしているが死んでいる者はいない","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is seriously injured, but no one is dead."},{"lineNumber":254222,"originalJapaneseLine":"不幸中の幸いですと騎士は言っている","translatedEnglishLine":"The knights say it is a blessing in misfortune."},{"lineNumber":254223,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィはどこだ、わかりません・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is Silky? I don't know..."},{"lineNumber":254224,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこだ、シルキィ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is Silky..."},{"lineNumber":254225,"originalJapaneseLine":"混戦状態になってきて分かりませんね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It's becoming a confused melee; we can't tell..."},{"lineNumber":254226,"originalJapaneseLine":"煙の中からランスの目の前に甲冑の化け物が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"From within the smoke, an armored monster appeared before Lance."},{"lineNumber":254227,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ・・こいつは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What... is this guy...?"},{"lineNumber":254228,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラがシルキィと気が付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera realizes it’s Silky."},{"lineNumber":254229,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィもサテラの事に気が付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky also notices Satera."},{"lineNumber":254230,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが話かけるとシルキィはそのまま速度上げて立ち去った","translatedEnglishLine":"When Satera spoke to her, Silky sped up and left without replying."},{"lineNumber":254231,"originalJapaneseLine":"今のがシルキィか・・ちょっとまて話が違うじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Was that Silky...? Wait a minute, this is different than what I heard."},{"lineNumber":254232,"originalJapaneseLine":"可愛い女の子と聞いたのに、なんだあの筋肉だるまは","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard she was a cute girl, but what’s with that muscle-bound giant?"},{"lineNumber":254233,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれはシルキィの甲冑、中にちゃんといる","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s Silky’s armor; she’s actually inside it."},{"lineNumber":254234,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、中か・・よし、オーケ","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, inside... alright, okay."},{"lineNumber":254235,"originalJapaneseLine":"追うぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's chase her."},{"lineNumber":254236,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場、うろうろしていたランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance wandering around the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254237,"originalJapaneseLine":"香澄他、チューリップ１号を装備した部隊と合う","translatedEnglishLine":"Meets Kasumi and others, a unit equipped with Tulip No.1."},{"lineNumber":254238,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前らどうしてここに・・チューリップ２号は？","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you guys here... what about Tulip No.2?"},{"lineNumber":254239,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれは昨晩のうちに魔軍に攻められ壊されてしまいました。","translatedEnglishLine":"That was attacked and destroyed by the demon army last night."},{"lineNumber":254240,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス将軍が待避命令を出してくれていたおかげ助かったうんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to General Bares issuing an evacuation order, we were saved, or something like that."},{"lineNumber":254241,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場、魔人シルキィを見つけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"On the battlefield, Silky the demon was found."},{"lineNumber":254242,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに気がつかずに通りすぎようとするが、ランスが止める","translatedEnglishLine":"She tries to pass by without noticing Lance, but Lance stops her."},{"lineNumber":254243,"originalJapaneseLine":"てめぇを倒しにきたぞ、がはははは","translatedEnglishLine":"I came to defeat you, hahaha!"},{"lineNumber":254244,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスも威張る、ここであったが百年目・・殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos brags, \"It’s our hundredth meeting here... I'll kill you!\""},

{"lineNumber":254245,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣カオスを持つ者か・・・（ガイの思い出があるので複雑）","translatedEnglishLine":"One who wields the demonic sword Chaos... (complicated due to memories of Guy)"},

{"lineNumber":254246,"originalJapaneseLine":"手加減は出来ないぞ。悪い事は言わない逃げろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t hold back. I'm giving you good advice: run away."},

{"lineNumber":254247,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが話かけるが、答えない無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera tries to speak, but is ignored without reply."},

{"lineNumber":254248,"originalJapaneseLine":"その鎧、剥いでくれるわーとランスが飛びかかる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance lunges, saying, \"I’ll peel off that armor!\""},

{"lineNumber":254249,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"→ Battle"},{"lineNumber":254250,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第２ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle - Turn 2."},

{"lineNumber":254251,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝てんわ、なんじゃこいつは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t win, what is this thing..."},

{"lineNumber":254252,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラかの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation from Satera."},

{"lineNumber":254253,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身魔導具の塊、世界に唯一のカオスは別格だが","translatedEnglishLine":"A mass of magical devices all over the body. The world's only Chaos is in a class of its own."},

{"lineNumber":254254,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスより少し劣る超級の魔法具が数百個集まった姿だ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a form made up of hundreds of super-class magical devices slightly inferior to Chaos."},

{"lineNumber":254255,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし・・いつもと比べるとこれは・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"However... compared to usual, this is..."},

{"lineNumber":254256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィの前身＝すごい魔法具の塊、とても強い","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky's former form = an amazing mass of magical devices, very strong."},

{"lineNumber":254257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　という説明","translatedEnglishLine":"That is the explanation."},

{"lineNumber":254258,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第４ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle - Turn 4."},

{"lineNumber":254259,"originalJapaneseLine":"おい、無理だぞ・・逃げた方がいいんじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, it’s impossible... maybe we should run away."},

{"lineNumber":254260,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやだ、脱がす・・あの魔法具の塊をひっぱがして中の","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I want to strip her... pull off that mass of magical devices and see inside."},

{"lineNumber":254261,"originalJapaneseLine":"美少女を見るんだー","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to see the beautiful girl inside!"},

{"lineNumber":254262,"originalJapaneseLine":"死んだら元も個もないだろうが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If you die, there’ll be nothing left though..."},

{"lineNumber":254263,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝てないから逃げた方がいいのにとユーザーに","translatedEnglishLine":"Implying to the user that since we can't win, it’s better to run away."},

{"lineNumber":254264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　暗に負けでストーリーが展開するパターンであると匂わす","translatedEnglishLine":"Subtly suggesting this will lead to a story branch of losing."},

{"lineNumber":254265,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は全滅で倒される","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and his party are defeated and wiped out."},

{"lineNumber":254266,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera"},

{"lineNumber":254267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスを守りながら、シルキィ・・あんた、なんでケイブリスの手下に","translatedEnglishLine":"While protecting Lance, she says, \"Silky... why are you serving Kaibris's minions?\""},

{"lineNumber":254268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホーネット様はどうしたのよとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"And, \"What happened to Lady Hornet...?\""},

{"lineNumber":254269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィはサテラの問いかけには答えずに立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky does not answer Satera's questions and leaves."},

{"lineNumber":254270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※ここで少しだけ甲冑を解いて素顔を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"*Here, she loosens her armor a bit to reveal her bare face."},

{"lineNumber":254271,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウレーン部隊（ランス達の護衛）が来る、すみません、とても援護に入れませんでした","translatedEnglishLine":"The Howleen squad (Lance’s bodyguards) arrive, apologizing, unable to provide support."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達は戦わなくていいのでしょうかとシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil asks, "Do we not have to fight?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、雑魚は雑魚に任せておけばいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, let the small fry handle the small fry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから２時間ほど立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About two hours passed since then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くつろいでいる様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are relaxing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告、魔人シルキィが現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report comes in: the demon Silky has appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつものように単独で現れ、戦線をかき乱しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As usual, she appeared alone and is disrupting the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、捕まえて犯す！いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, capture her and violate her! Let's go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れた傷付いたリーザス騎士、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fallen and wounded Leazas knights,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどまでシルキィの突進を受けていた部隊だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the unit that had just been charged by Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな大げがしているが死んでいる者はいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is seriously injured, but no one is dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸中の幸いですと騎士は言っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The knights say it is a blessing in misfortune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはどこだ、わかりません・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Silky? I don't know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだ、シルキィ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Silky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混戦状態になってきて分かりませんね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's becoming a confused melee; we can't tell...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 煙の中からランスの目の前に甲冑の化け物が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From within the smoke, an armored monster appeared before Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・こいつは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this guy...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがシルキィと気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera realizes it’s Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィもサテラの事に気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky also notices Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが話かけるとシルキィはそのまま速度上げて立ち去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Satera spoke to her, Silky sped up and left without replying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のがシルキィか・・ちょっとまて話が違うじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was that Silky...? Wait a minute, this is different than what I heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い女の子と聞いたのに、なんだあの筋肉だるまは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard she was a cute girl, but what’s with that muscle-bound giant?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはシルキィの甲冑、中にちゃんといる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s Silky’s armor; she’s actually inside it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、中か・・よし、オーケ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, inside... alright, okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's chase her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場、うろうろしていたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance wandering around the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香澄他、チューリップ１号を装備した部隊と合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meets Kasumi and others, a unit equipped with Tulip No.1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らどうしてここに・・チューリップ２号は？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you guys here... what about Tulip No.2?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは昨晩のうちに魔軍に攻められ壊されてしまいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was attacked and destroyed by the demon army last night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス将軍が待避命令を出してくれていたおかげ助かったうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to General Bares issuing an evacuation order, we were saved, or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場、魔人シルキィを見つけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the battlefield, Silky the demon was found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに気がつかずに通りすぎようとするが、ランスが止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tries to pass by without noticing Lance, but Lance stops her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめぇを倒しにきたぞ、がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I came to defeat you, hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスも威張る、ここであったが百年目・・殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos brags, "It’s our hundredth meeting here... I'll kill you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持つ者か・・・（ガイの思い出があるので複雑）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One who wields the demonic sword Chaos... (complicated due to memories of Guy)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手加減は出来ないぞ。悪い事は言わない逃げろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t hold back. I'm giving you good advice: run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが話かけるが、答えない無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera tries to speak, but is ignored without reply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その鎧、剥いでくれるわーとランスが飛びかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance lunges, saying, "I’ll peel off that armor!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: → Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てんわ、なんじゃこいつは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t win, what is this thing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラかの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation from Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身魔導具の塊、世界に唯一のカオスは別格だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mass of magical devices all over the body. The world's only Chaos is in a class of its own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスより少し劣る超級の魔法具が数百個集まった姿だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a form made up of hundreds of super-class magical devices slightly inferior to Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし・・いつもと比べるとこれは・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However... compared to usual, this is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの前身＝すごい魔法具の塊、とても強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's former form = an amazing mass of magical devices, very strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第４ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、無理だぞ・・逃げた方がいいんじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, it’s impossible... maybe we should run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやだ、脱がす・・あの魔法具の塊をひっぱがして中の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I want to strip her... pull off that mass of magical devices and see inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美少女を見るんだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to see the beautiful girl inside!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだら元も個もないだろうが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you die, there’ll be nothing left though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てないから逃げた方がいいのにとユーザーに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Implying to the user that since we can't win, it’s better to run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗に負けでストーリーが展開するパターンであると匂わす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Subtly suggesting this will lead to a story branch of losing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は全滅で倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his party are defeated and wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを守りながら、シルキィ・・あんた、なんでケイブリスの手下に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While protecting Lance, she says, "Silky... why are you serving Kaibris's minions?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット様はどうしたのよとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, "What happened to Lady Hornet...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはサテラの問いかけには答えずに立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky does not answer Satera's questions and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここで少しだけ甲冑を解いて素顔を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Here, she loosens her armor a bit to reveal her bare face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーン部隊（ランス達の護衛）が来る、すみません、とても援護に入れませんでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Howleen squad (Lance’s bodyguards) arrive, apologizing, unable to provide support.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

I'll kill you!\""},

{"lineNumber":254245,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔剣カオスを持つ者か・・・（ガイの思い出があるので複雑）","translatedEnglishLine":"One who wields the demonic sword Chaos... (complicated due to memories of Guy)"},

{"lineNumber":254246,"originalJapaneseLine":"手加減は出来ないぞ。悪い事は言わない逃げろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t hold back. I'm giving you good advice: run away."},

{"lineNumber":254247,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが話かけるが、答えない無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera tries to speak, but is ignored without reply."},

{"lineNumber":254248,"originalJapaneseLine":"その鎧、剥いでくれるわーとランスが飛びかかる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance lunges, saying, \"I’ll peel off that armor!\""},

{"lineNumber":254249,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"→ Battle"},{"lineNumber":254250,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第２ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle - Turn 2."},

{"lineNumber":254251,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝てんわ、なんじゃこいつは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t win, what is this thing..."},

{"lineNumber":254252,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラかの説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation from Satera."},

{"lineNumber":254253,"originalJapaneseLine":"全身魔導具の塊、世界に唯一のカオスは別格だが","translatedEnglishLine":"A mass of magical devices all over the body. The world's only Chaos is in a class of its own."},

{"lineNumber":254254,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスより少し劣る超級の魔法具が数百個集まった姿だ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a form made up of hundreds of super-class magical devices slightly inferior to Chaos."},

{"lineNumber":254255,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし・・いつもと比べるとこれは・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"However... compared to usual, this is..."},

{"lineNumber":254256,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィの前身＝すごい魔法具の塊、とても強い","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky's former form = an amazing mass of magical devices, very strong."},

{"lineNumber":254257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　という説明","translatedEnglishLine":"That is the explanation."},

{"lineNumber":254258,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第４ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle - Turn 4."},

{"lineNumber":254259,"originalJapaneseLine":"おい、無理だぞ・・逃げた方がいいんじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, it’s impossible... maybe we should run away."},

{"lineNumber":254260,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやだ、脱がす・・あの魔法具の塊をひっぱがして中の","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I want to strip her... pull off that mass of magical devices and see inside."},

{"lineNumber":254261,"originalJapaneseLine":"美少女を見るんだー","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to see the beautiful girl inside!"},

{"lineNumber":254262,"originalJapaneseLine":"死んだら元も個もないだろうが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If you die, there’ll be nothing left though..."},

{"lineNumber":254263,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝てないから逃げた方がいいのにとユーザーに","translatedEnglishLine":"Implying to the user that since we can't win, it’s better to run away."},

{"lineNumber":254264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　暗に負けでストーリーが展開するパターンであると匂わす","translatedEnglishLine":"Subtly suggesting this will lead to a story branch of losing."},

{"lineNumber":254265,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は全滅で倒される","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and his party are defeated and wiped out."},

{"lineNumber":254266,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera"},

{"lineNumber":254267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスを守りながら、シルキィ・・あんた、なんでケイブリスの手下に","translatedEnglishLine":"While protecting Lance, she says, \"Silky... why are you serving Kaibris's minions?\""},

{"lineNumber":254268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホーネット様はどうしたのよとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"And, \"What happened to Lady Hornet...?\""},

{"lineNumber":254269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィはサテラの問いかけには答えずに立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky does not answer Satera's questions and leaves."},

{"lineNumber":254270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※ここで少しだけ甲冑を解いて素顔を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"*Here, she loosens her armor a bit to reveal her bare face."},

{"lineNumber":254271,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウレーン部隊（ランス達の護衛）が来る、すみません、とても援護に入れませんでした","translatedEnglishLine":"The Howleen squad (Lance’s bodyguards) arrive, apologizing, unable to provide support."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達は戦わなくていいのでしょうかとシィル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil asks, "Do we not have to fight?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、雑魚は雑魚に任せておけばいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, let the small fry handle the small fry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから２時間ほど立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About two hours passed since then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くつろいでいる様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are relaxing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに報告、魔人シルキィが現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report comes in: the demon Silky has appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつものように単独で現れ、戦線をかき乱しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As usual, she appeared alone and is disrupting the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、捕まえて犯す！いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, capture her and violate her! Let's go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れた傷付いたリーザス騎士、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fallen and wounded Leazas knights,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどまでシルキィの突進を受けていた部隊だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the unit that had just been charged by Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな大げがしているが死んでいる者はいない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is seriously injured, but no one is dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸中の幸いですと騎士は言っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The knights say it is a blessing in misfortune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはどこだ、わかりません・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Silky? I don't know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだ、シルキィ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Silky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混戦状態になってきて分かりませんね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's becoming a confused melee; we can't tell...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 煙の中からランスの目の前に甲冑の化け物が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From within the smoke, an armored monster appeared before Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ・・こいつは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... is this guy...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがシルキィと気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera realizes it’s Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィもサテラの事に気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky also notices Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが話かけるとシルキィはそのまま速度上げて立ち去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Satera spoke to her, Silky sped up and left without replying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のがシルキィか・・ちょっとまて話が違うじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was that Silky...? Wait a minute, this is different than what I heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い女の子と聞いたのに、なんだあの筋肉だるまは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard she was a cute girl, but what’s with that muscle-bound giant?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはシルキィの甲冑、中にちゃんといる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s Silky’s armor; she’s actually inside it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、中か・・よし、オーケ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, inside... alright, okay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's chase her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場、うろうろしていたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance wandering around the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香澄他、チューリップ１号を装備した部隊と合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meets Kasumi and others, a unit equipped with Tulip No.1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前らどうしてここに・・チューリップ２号は？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you guys here... what about Tulip No.2?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは昨晩のうちに魔軍に攻められ壊されてしまいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was attacked and destroyed by the demon army last night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス将軍が待避命令を出してくれていたおかげ助かったうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to General Bares issuing an evacuation order, we were saved, or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場、魔人シルキィを見つけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the battlefield, Silky the demon was found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに気がつかずに通りすぎようとするが、ランスが止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tries to pass by without noticing Lance, but Lance stops her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめぇを倒しにきたぞ、がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I came to defeat you, hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスも威張る、ここであったが百年目・・殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos brags, "It’s our hundredth meeting here... I'll kill you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持つ者か・・・（ガイの思い出があるので複雑）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One who wields the demonic sword Chaos... (complicated due to memories of Guy)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手加減は出来ないぞ。悪い事は言わない逃げろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t hold back. I'm giving you good advice: run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが話かけるが、答えない無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera tries to speak, but is ignored without reply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その鎧、剥いでくれるわーとランスが飛びかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance lunges, saying, "I’ll peel off that armor!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: → Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てんわ、なんじゃこいつは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t win, what is this thing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラかの説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation from Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身魔導具の塊、世界に唯一のカオスは別格だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mass of magical devices all over the body. The world's only Chaos is in a class of its own.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスより少し劣る超級の魔法具が数百個集まった姿だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a form made up of hundreds of super-class magical devices slightly inferior to Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし・・いつもと比べるとこれは・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However... compared to usual, this is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの前身＝すごい魔法具の塊、とても強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky's former form = an amazing mass of magical devices, very strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第４ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、無理だぞ・・逃げた方がいいんじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, it’s impossible... maybe we should run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやだ、脱がす・・あの魔法具の塊をひっぱがして中の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I want to strip her... pull off that mass of magical devices and see inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美少女を見るんだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to see the beautiful girl inside!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだら元も個もないだろうが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you die, there’ll be nothing left though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝てないから逃げた方がいいのにとユーザーに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Implying to the user that since we can't win, it’s better to run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗に負けでストーリーが展開するパターンであると匂わす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Subtly suggesting this will lead to a story branch of losing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は全滅で倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his party are defeated and wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを守りながら、シルキィ・・あんた、なんでケイブリスの手下に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While protecting Lance, she says, "Silky... why are you serving Kaibris's minions?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット様はどうしたのよとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, "What happened to Lady Hornet...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィはサテラの問いかけには答えずに立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky does not answer Satera's questions and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここで少しだけ甲冑を解いて素顔を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Here, she loosens her armor a bit to reveal her bare face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーン部隊（ランス達の護衛）が来る、すみません、とても援護に入れませんでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Howleen squad (Lance’s bodyguards) arrive, apologizing, unable to provide support.
